column5: I am headed to LOW Ptarmigan Bay area next week and was wondering how difficult the passage to Shoal Lake is at this time. How's lake level? I haven't been in this area of LOW before but have been to on Shoal. I will be fishing musky most of time but will also fish walleye and smallies. If I can get down to Shoal, I'll fish for pike and smallies. Any help appreciated.
